name: Heroes of Loot 2
description: Control multiple heroes at once in this dungeon crawling action adventure rpg, a mix of classic 80's Gauntlet-action and quests
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2.0 ghz Dual Core Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL supported sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD3000 or higher with OpenGL 2.1 support Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL supported sound card
